content_descriptors.notes: Battles against monsters, skeletons and people without displaying cruelty and without blood.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 | Mint 21.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 | AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050, 4GB | AMD RX 560, 4GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Vulkan and driver version 21.0.3+ for AMD or 495.44+ for Nvidia
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 | Mint 21.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050, 4GB | AMD RX 560, 4GB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: GPU must support Vulkan and driver version 21.0.3+ for AMD or 495.44+ for Nvidia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210 | AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620 | AMD RX Vega 3
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R9 270, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
